attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have made you as God. Exodus 7: 1 
The Right Honorable Prime Minster Tony Blair is God of the 21st Century anointed and appointed by Jesus Christ to help the generation of the 21st Century. For the action of the World Economic Forum in Davos, The Right Honorable Prime Minster Tony Blair deserves the support of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth to accomplish issues of climate change, world trade and Africa during his third and fourth term.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
